examples: She's got a terribly guilty conscience about it.
I feel almost guilty that so many good things are happening to us.
She was looking rather guilty when I came into the room.
I feel very guilty about leaving her.

meanings.meaning: having broken the law/done sth wrong

examples: He pleaded guilty to starting the fire.
No one believed him guilty of this terrible crime. A person should never be presumed guilty.
Company directors may be deemed guilty of an offence if their company causes pollution. He was found guilty of murder.
She was certainly guilty, but the police couldn't prove it.
